main event: A sheriff reported observing a glowing reddish-purple object about 11 feet across in Borger, Texas, on August 8, 1963.
interesting points: The object was silent and moved slowly,The object left a 3-inch wide mark on the ground without lighting the surrounding grass and bushes,The sighting lasted for approximately 30 minutes,The sheriff took several witnesses to the site two days later but found nothing,Correspondence regarding the sighting involved letters to Project Blue Book and mentions of substance samples.
witness description: Sheriff and other individuals involved in the reports
